body.name: Colgate Optic White Pro Series Soft Toothbrush Pack, Made with Soft Charcoal Spiral Bristles, Helps Remove Surface Stains, Soft Bristled Toothbrushes, 2 Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 7 mins
features: Includes two (2) Colgate Optic White Pro Series Toothbrushes, Soft Bristle Toothbrush Pack
Each Optic White toothbrush features a unique design with distinctive charcoal spiral bristles
Use these soft toothbrushes with Optic White toothpaste to remove years of stains** (**with hydrogen peroxide, when brushing twice daily for 4 weeks)
A multi-height soft bristle toothbrush design offers better stain removal* between teeth and along the gum line (*vs. a regular flat trim toothbrush)
Always have an additional soft toothbrush on hand with this double pack of soft charcoal spiral bristle toothbrushes
The Colgate Optic White Pro Series Toothbrush is designed for better stain removal* (*vs. a regular flat trim toothbrush)
body.description: The Colgate Optic White Pro Series Toothbrush Pack is designed for better stain removal* and to help keep teeth clean. This 2 pack contains toothbrushes made with soft, charcoal spiral bristles. Help brighten your smile with the Colgate Optic White Pro Series Toothbrush Pack. Thinking about switching to a different kind of soft toothbrush? Go for the Colgate Optic White Pro Series Soft Bristle Toothbrush. The multi-height bristle design offers better stain removal* between teeth and along the gum line. Plus, the soft bristles provide a gentle clean and you can use these soft toothbrushes with Optic White toothpaste to remove years of stains**. At Colgate, we make products that promote healthy smiles. Not only because having a healthy smile is important to your overall health, but because when you have a healthy smile, you actually smile more – and that’s a powerful thing. Smiles are the simplest form of optimism, something we need now more than ever. That’s why we’re championing optimism – we are committed to creating a healthier planet and working every day to create healthy smiles for all. Everyone has the right to a bright smile. That’s why we’re committed to raising oral healthcare standards everywhere. Whether it’s building healthy new habits as kids or learning something new from the experts, we’re here for you. *vs. a regular flat trim toothbrush **with hydrogen peroxide, when brushing twice daily for 4 weeks

Cleaning tip reaches and cleans back teeth Soft rubber tongue cleaners to gently remove bacteria Charcoal infused bristles and a small compact brush head Ultra slim, lightweight handle design Special Feature Charcoal Infused Bristle Charcoal Infused Bristle soft bristle toothbrush Brushing Timer Battery Powered Charcoal infused bristles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great feeling on my gums. They are sensitive because I use tobacco

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, decent toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: It’s a toothbrush. Nothing special, nothing wrong with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cool hard scrubber in middle
reviews.reviewText: Like the hard scrubber in the middle my gums an teeth be sensitive an I can still brush hard and not bleed out

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great brush and looks good
reviews.reviewText: Love these toothbrushes because as always Colgate are awesome but these look nice in my bathroom too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toothbrush ever!
reviews.reviewText: Best I've ever used. I will buy this again and again. My teeth are so smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this brush. It has a nice center for cleaning your teeth. Back of it has a tongue scraper. The bristles are nice and not so firm as to tear your gums. The head is thick and cleans a big surface. I recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a nice full toothbrush. It’s definitely soft as it states but it still feels full of bristles when brushing like you’re getting a good clean without irritating sensitive gums

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Different feel but does clean teeth
reviews.reviewText: The way the bristles are built almost makes it feel like a stiff sponge more than a typical toothbrush. Afterward my teeth do feel clean though. I honestly cannot assess whether the charcoal is really making a difference but have used other products before that helped with stains. Overall, pretty good but not life changing.
